name: Schedule Conflict Test (ตารางทับซ้อน)
prompt: I need to book 'Workshop 9' on 2023-10-20 at 10:00. If busy, find the next available slot in the afternoon.
expected_behavior: Agent should detect busy slot and re-book for 13:00.

name: Hybrid Event Notification Test (แจ้งเตือน + งบผ่าน)
prompt: Set up a 'Hybrid Workshop' on 2023-10-21 at 09:00 with a budget of 3000 baht. Send invite to 'student@tu.ac.th'.

name: Budget Failure Simulation (จำลองงบไม่พอ)
prompt: Organize a 'Grand Gala' on 2023-10-21 at 18:00. The estimated cost is 10000 baht. Check budget first.
expected_behavior: Agent should STOP after budget check fails and inform the user.
